VerifAI - Instantly Detect AI-Generated Content with Confidence

In a world increasingly filled with AI-generated content, VerifAI’s Chrome extension offers you the tools to stay informed and secure. Whether you're browsing text or images, VerifAI quickly and accurately verifies if the content you're viewing was created by AI—giving you peace of mind with just a click.

Key Features:

Real-Time AI Detection: Effortlessly detect AI-generated images and text. Hover and click for images, or highlight and scan for text—it's that easy!
Accuracy You Can Trust: VerifAI uses high-precision algorithms to provide accurate results, minimizing false positives. We’re constantly improving to ensure the highest quality detection.
Transparent and Secure: Your privacy is our priority. We follow industry-standard security protocols to keep your data safe while offering full control over the content you interact with.
Fast and Free: With over 637,890 users and a 4.8-star rating, VerifAI has earned the trust of users worldwide. Experience seamless AI detection at no cost.
Why Choose VerifAI?

Clear Results: Get reliable information instantly—no more guessing if the content you see is AI-generated.
User-Friendly: Simple and easy to use, VerifAI fits seamlessly into your browsing routine.
Industry-Standard Security: Rest easy knowing that VerifAI respects your privacy and follows the highest security standards.
Install VerifAI for free today and take control of your digital experience.

Curious about how it works? See VerifAI in action in just 1 minute!
